title: When will the school and college reopen in 2020? What do you think? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my state, schools and colleges are planning to be open in a face-to-face mode in a few weeks. I start class exactly one month from today. What do I think? Speaking in my private capacity: That these decisions should be made, purely based in science (rather than politics).
Most are scheduled to open in September but that depends on the stage of the virus in there location. I’m not sure that many states are ready to open that early.
